channel.title: wordpress on Khalid's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in wordpress on Khalid's Blog

item.title: Bye Wordpress, Hello ... ?
item.description: It’s been long years since I used WordPress in 2006 as my blogging platform, back in the old days there’s nothing can beat what WordPress offers for bloggers. So many themes, plugins, and It’s still the most-used and well-known blogging platform until now. According to W3Techs Survey, WordPress is used by 63.6% of all the websites whose content management system we know. This is 38.3% of all websites. Every year’s website powered by WordPress is significantly rising.
